Comments_List: I learned about the history and implementation of several psychological assessment tests.

We covered a large amount of material and I appreciate feeling more familiar with a host of assessment instruments. That being said, it may also be beneficial to spend less time reading about assessment in the first few weeks of the course to spend more time developing familiarity with the various batteries. I appreciated the reading, and wonder if it could have been spread out a bit more so that we could have spent more time with each important article/chapter.
The course covers a lot of ground but I think it spent the most time where it needed to!
